bike.description: S-Works Enduro FACT 10m carbon main triangle, Az1 construction, M5 rear triangle, full cartridge bearing pivots, adj. geometry, replaceable derailleur hanger, 150mm travel

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ Spike valve, air spring, adj. rebound and low speed compression, 7.875x2.25"
S-Works Future Shock e150SL, lightweight machined dual crown w/ integrated stem, 150mm travel, rebound, compresion and travel adj., 25mm thru-axle, lightweight machined alloy steerer.
1-1/8" Threadless, Campy style upper and lower cartridge bearing
S-Works, Future Shock , CNC machined, 31.8 calmp integrated w/ fork
Shimano M971 XTR, DMD top swing, dual pull
Specialized Command Post, 100mm Adjustable height, Remote Operated, single-bolt head
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 36.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
